page.title: Gallery of coats of arms of dependent territories

revisions.rev:

Image:Coat of arms of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands.svg|[[Coat of arms of South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands|Coat of arms of]] [[South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands]] Image:Coat of arms of Tristan da Cunha.svg|[[Coat of arms of Tristan da Cunha|Coat of arms of]] [[Tristan da Cunha]] ==[[United States]]== Image:Coat of Arms of American Samoa.svg|[[Coat of arms of American Samoa|Coat of arms of]] [[American Samoa]] Image:Coa American Virgin Islands.gif|[[Coat of arms of the United States Virgin Islands|Coat of arms of]] the [[American Virgin Islands]] Image:Coat of arms of Guam.svg|[[Coat of arms of Guam|Coat of arms of]] [[Guam]] Image:Northern Mariana Islands seal.png|[[Seal of the Northern Mariana Islands|Seal of]] the [[Northern Mariana Islands]] File:Coat of Arms of Puerto Rico.svg|[[Coat of arms of Puerto Rico|Coat of arms of]] [[Puerto Rico]] ==See also== * [[Gallery of sovereign state coats of arms]] * [[Gallery of sovereign-state flags]] * [[Gallery of dependent territory flags]] ==External links== * Main source : International Civic Arms (33.000 arms of countries, states etc) [http://www.ngw.nl Heraldry of the World] [[Category:Coat of arms images]]
